mapper.select: SELECT n.idn_notification, n.origin, n.information, n.start_date, nu.idn_notification_user FROM tpa_tnotification n, tpa_tnotification_user nu, tpa_tuser u WHERE n.is_enabled = 'Y' AND n.idn_notification = nu.idn_notification AND nu.is_acknowledge = 'N' AND nu.idn_user = u.idn_user AND u.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY n.start_date DESC

SELECT n.idn_notification, n.origin, n.information, n.start_date, nu.idn_notification_user FROM tpa_tnotification n, tpa_tnotification_user nu, tpa_tuser u WHERE n.is_enabled = 'Y' AND n.idn_notification = nu.idn_notification AND nu.is_acknowledge = 'N' AND nu.idn_user = u.idn_user AND u.user_id = #{user_id} AND n.origin = #{origin} ORDER BY n.start_date DESC
